QuestData.Title: The Ever Drowning
QuestData.Description: Stay close, Champion. I have some magical items that might help us defend briefly against magic attacks, but Azshara was the greatest mage our kind has ever known.$b$bI do not feel confident that these trinkets will hold back her power for long, or even be usable afterward.$b$bSpeak with me when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Shandris Feathermoon through the Drowned Market.
